text: Doylesport is an extinct town in Barton County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The community most likely has the name of the local Doyle family. A post office called Doylesport was established in 1868, and remained in operation until 1877. Besides the post office, Doylesport had a schoolhouse. ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Barton County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Doylesport, Missouri
